original: Saraṇaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: saraṇam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca naaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca na araṇaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: ca naaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na araṇaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri

original: Saraṇaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇam dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Saraṇaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
analyzed: saraṇam adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
